tool_description: Randomized Profile Pictures Bazaar for your Brand New Users
name: randomized-avatar-api
title: randomized-avatar-api

api_list.name: Get A Random Avatar Image
api_list.description: This endpoint will return an image url for you to use directly for profile Images.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://randomized-avatar-api.p.rapidapi.com/getRandomAvatar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomized-avatar-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://randomized-avatar-api.p.rapidapi.com/getRandomAvatar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
